name: The Monoliths of Reality
description:
The Monoliths of Reality is a game where you are an explorer who fell into a maze during an exploration in a pyramyd. By doing that, you disturbed the Gods' nap, and they are now furious at you. To calm them down, they asked you to turn some things real thanks to the obelisks in the maze.
It is a short game, but repeatable because everything is generated randomly so you won't play twice the same game : the goal and the maze change everytime. 
This game was developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "it is not real" and i made it solo in 6 days.
